lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello, everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors roll dice, play Dungeons and Dragons, and Liam once again throws curses at me right before we start the stream. It's good, it's good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I love you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I love you too. Sam's on his way, he'll be here shortly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Lies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Getting on a plane!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I gotta pack a bag!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Never unpacked it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking forward to seeing you guys there tomorrow. We have a panel tomorrow and on Sunday-- Saturday. My week, it's been a long week. Saturday panel at 2PM, which will be--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: On the main gaming stage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It will be hosted there for you guys to watch, who can't be there in person.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And in case you forget, you can always follow Critical Role on Twitter, @criticalrole, and the panels will be posted there, I mean, the schedule, so you guys can find us. Or follow any of us for our individual signing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have a team of hundreds that man the Twitter handle with information.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hundreds of twos, of threes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Like Bond villains.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mainly Liam. Mainly Liam.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good use of henchmen, it works out well. So look forward to that. Also, we have going up, it should be on the store tonight--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sam's here!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everything's through the filter nowadays. It's really bad. I have a serious problem. We have going up on the store tonight at Geek & Sundry, we have prints-- our Critical Role poster prints with characters. We also have--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Buy it right now!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right now, on geekandsundry.com.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sam, you look different tonight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You look handsomer.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is impossible.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do like your shirt.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It is a very nice shirt.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We already-- we already covered all this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's okay, it's good. Redundancy is good in this industry. So, in that regard, also, we may be, I think we're supposed to have more "How do you want to do this?" shirts up. Supposed to be up soon?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's some really cool stuff coming. Really cool stuff.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't know what's coming, do we?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And also just a reminder to all of our friends over in the Europe area, me and Marisha will be guests at Kaizoku Con the first weekend of March, in Cork, Ireland, so we're excited to go and meet a bunch of Critters out there. Kaizoku. A Gaelic mythological creature, the Kaizoku. So, those are my base announcements, do we have anything else anyone wants to mention on the stream?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have a thing. We got to announce a thing this week.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did we get to announce?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We got to announce "Black Butler."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right! We have "Black Butler: Book of Circus," they announced the cast, where Taliesin, you play--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I'm in "Book of Murder," two completely different butlers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, it's a thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm buttling in "Book of Murder" as Sir Arthur Conan Doyle, so that's exciting. It's the weirdest accent I've ever done. It is all over the place.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "Oh, hallo"-- (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Might beat that one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In "Book of Circus," I play Joker. I'm excited to jump into that little realm there, so look forward to that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are in an intimate relationship with Wyrmwood Gaming and if you go to wyrmwoodgaming.com and use the code "critrole," "critrole," you will get free shipping on these beautiful boxes. They hold dice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They hold dice, they are magnetic, so they stay closed, they hold your dice so well-- oh--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Enchanted by witches.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) That's a beautiful presentation, guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm proud of each and every one of you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I went to NYU.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hey, see.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I dropped out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anything else? Cool. We're good? All right, let's dive into tonight's episode proper. So, last we left off, the party Vox Machina, having recently suffered their main city of Emon and one of their initial towns where they began their adventures in Westruun under attack from an entity called the Chroma Conclave, a collection of allied chromatic dragons, extremely powerful, ancient across the board, it seems, is wreaking havoc across all of Tal'Dorei. They managed to save a few allies, make a few current, tenuous relationships with the Clasp, and moved all of the refugees that they had been keeping within Greyskull Keep to Whitestone to keep them safe for the time being, as that town had seemingly been passed over by the dragons that are still heading east across the continent. After that, the party made their way to Vasselheim. Vasselheim, the distant city known as the Cradle of Faith, the oldest living beacon of civilization in the world that is currently known. After making their way there, the party made their way into the Guild of the Slayer's Take, where they had previously signed on after a trial and are members of, to seek more allies throughout the city of Vasselheim in hopes of preparing themselves to retake Emon, possibly Tal'Dorei at some point in the near future. That is where we left off. As you guys have spent some time resting within the actual-- we've got whispers going around over here already, and we haven't started.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you want to say?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No thank you, keep going.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Two can play at that game. So, as you guys take a little bit of time, getting reacquainted with the Guild Hall of the Slayer's Take, setting your stuff down that you need to prepare for a short period of time staying in the city or longer if need be. You ran briefly into Mertin Cyndrial, the husband of Vanessa, who's the Huntmaster of the entire Guild, and had a brief conversation with Aldor, who was beating Thorbir at cards.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What a dick.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Love that guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's a nice fella.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not Thorbir, he's great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. Not very good with dice. So, that being the case, what would you guys like to do at this point in time?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know, I'm just asking you guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So we slept and we woke up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just arrived now, it's mid-dayish at this point. Early morning to mid-day.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, we slept at the Slayer's Take, we talked to Aldor for a minute, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You haven't slept, you've arrived, it's like morning, mid-day now. You've just situated yourselves in the Guild. You had an evening's rest before you came here. But you have used your 7th-level spell to get here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes. Right, yeah, yeah, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what is the plan?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there one?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm, at this point, prepared for some decompression of some kind. No one can be expected to move at the speeds we've been moving at for the past week. Perhaps grab an early-morning drink and find out how much news has actually reached this town about what's happening out in the world right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a good idea, Percy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to find Lady Kima.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's actually an even better idea.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a fantastic idea.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Perhaps she will go to breakfast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's at the Temple of Bahamut?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That sounds right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just throwing it out there, you might need some supplies.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's interesting, because I sleep at night and these voices from nowhere consistently remind me that there's a black powder merchant in this--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What game are you talking about? We don't have time for games, there are dragons that need dealing with.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're right. How silly of me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Stick to music, please. We don't need games.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Kima, I think, is an excellent idea.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kima is a great idea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Last I heard, Victor was blown apart.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We also need-- oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We also need supplies.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yes. Hell yes. I don't have anything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need lots of potions, health potions.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, but they sell those here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They sell health potions here. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've purchased them in the past.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, they sell them here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Remember, that's where Grog had his fantastic bartering skills last time to acquire a few potions.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. I'm an investment banker.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's right. Oh, that merchant might be here still. We have so many things to catch up on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can also talk to the Slayer's Take as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're just waiting for Vanessa and Zahra to get back from their hunt. Am I right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who? Oh, the wife?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, Merkel's wife.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I didn't meet Zahra.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, you didn't.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's got a tail!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's quite wonderful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's very powerful.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's actually related to-- well, Percy, you would know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's related to Percy? I don't see the resemblance.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, she's related to Lillith. They actually are, they are related, that is true. Our friend from previously.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, our friend. From previously.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That would be the best course of action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys are going to head towards the--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you think Kima wants to go potion-shopping? Maybe we should go get some shit and then see Kima? I think Kima would be a little impatient.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That may actually be a good point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's go really fast. There's dragons in the world, we don't have time to shop.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you slam down an hourglass for shopping?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sister, dear, how much coin do we have at the moment?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, not a ton.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How many Pop-Tarts do we have?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have a lot of Pop-Tarts, but not very many gold pieces.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In the party, if anyone's holding coin, because I don't have much at all. I don't need much, but we do need healing potions.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have enough in the party funds to buy some healing potions, so I think--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is that including what we got from my sister?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, it is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's buy some potions.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're in charge, let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, as you guys heads towards the front door of the Slayer's Take Guild Hall, you're but feet from it before the door slams open as the cold winter wind comes pouring in.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that's right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There, standing in the doorway, you see the outer frame of a strong female form, dark brownish-black leathers, you can see tousled dark hair, piercing pupil-less eyes, and there stands Huntmaster Vanessa, clutching a bag that's seemingly dampened at its base in her right hand as she steps into the main foyer, looking about all of you gathered in the front area. "Well, "isn't this a nice surprise in the middle of the morning? Ah."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Welcome back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A pleasure to see you all. Ah, hold on. The rest of you, inside, where it's warmer." And as she steps inside, you see two individuals step out of the shadows behind her. One of which is another tiefling female, white hair, red in skin, and another individual, familiar to some of you: human, short brown shoulder-length hair, series of scars across his arm, carrying a shield and spear, as Kashaw and Zahra come in to accompany--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Get your ass in here!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Look what the bear brought in. Hello, darling.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where do I go?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I'm going to sneak through.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Hello. Have you gotten bigger?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. I've been lifting lots of horses and mules and stuff.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Oh, my goodness. Hello, darling.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good to see you.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: It's good to see you, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How are things?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I'm all right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Once you're in, you're stuck.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Hello.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hello.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You said your name was Ka-SHAW?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: It's KASH-aw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: KASH-aw. Like cash. I like it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: How are you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What are you doing here?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: This is kind of where I live. What are you doing here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just, you know, rolling through. Passing by. Not much.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Okay, who're--?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Kash, is that--?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: This is her, Z.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is the guy?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Vex, Vex, Vex! Vex, Vex, Vex, Vex, Vex!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I push Vex out of the way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) You called me over to push me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: You're Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I am Vex.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Oh, thank the gods. Yeah, he said you guys looked very similar and thankfully it's not too much, or I felt bad for you.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yes, you do look very similar. Does that mean you're--?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's my twin brother.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: It's so lovely to meet you. I whack him with my tail.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, jeez!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She does that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You are impressive.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: You are a big-- I recognize you. Wait a second. I won 75 gold pieces at the Crucible when I bet on Kern the Hammer.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You did?! That was money well spent, my friend.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Thank you for that night, by the way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're very welcome. These are my lackeys, I have a band of-- you know, wandering--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Lackeys?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He doesn't realize that you bet against him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would not bring-- good to see you again-- I wouldn't bring that up.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: It was a wonderful fight, did you see it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was, did you see me power-bomb him at the end?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Hello Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Lovely to see you again. It's been a complicated month, we'll get into it.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: How are the weapons holding up?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And you are?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Wh-what? Confused. Can you say that again?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just call me Percy.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Okay. Kashaw Vesh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Scanlan Shorthalt.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: How are you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's nice to meet you. I've heard many a tale of your wit and bravery.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We've heard so many things about you, Kash.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Hopefully all good, thank you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs, then coughs)

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Is he choking?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And you must be Zahra!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I am. And you are Keyleth, is that right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's right, yeah, yeah.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: You are beautiful, aren't you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (stutters)

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I told her, I told her.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, Vanessa groans, staring at this display.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I hope this has worked out well for all of you, I however, have a bit of business of ours to "finish, okay?"

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yes, we do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, what's in that bag?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, what'd you catch?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She walks up to the table where Mertin's standing, he reaches out to greet her, with arms extended. She throws it into his arms, he catches it, pulls it open. You see within there is a head of what looks like a humanoid head, but the skin is greyish and featureless. The eyes are whitish and milky. What hair is there, in wisps, is white in color. Who here is trained in arcana?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I think I am.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know what this is.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I already know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll an arcana check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why don't we ask you, then?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21. This is the head of a Doppelganger. This is a creature that spends a lot of its time infiltrating society, being able to take the form and shape of other individuals to assume their position, to take their wealth, to do all sorts of sometimes interesting or dastardly things.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Made him a bitch to find.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a shapeshifter?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What can you do with the head?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Spread the change and forget about it."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How do you know when you have one?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And what was it posing as?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And at that point, don't you just already have one at that point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, this is for me to worry about. Not for you to care."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Vanessa, I have a question.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, please."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you ever hunt creatures just because they're evil and they're killing people?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Generally, somebody will eventually be paying for such a creature to be hunted, so I do "not feel the necessity to do it, without--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if lots of people are dying and you might be at risk as well?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then I think it should be very easy to convince someone to pay for it."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What if the cost is the end of the world?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I imagine that would be quite a terrible thing."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure. That's what we're looking at here.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so. Vasselheim is unaware of what's going on, but a lot of cities have been destroyed.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Cities. Multiple, cities? Have been destroyed?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Multiple cities. Emon was the first one hit.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: It's

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, it's still there technically, just crumbled.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And flat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And under rule by an ancient red dragon.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: So much has changed since Lillith was there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So much.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: How did this happen?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He escaped. He'd been trapped in the fire plane, and--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're not entirely sure what happened, but he escaped the fire plane and somehow created a coalition of chromatic dragons and they are ravaging the countryside.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. Which is very strange.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: What color?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: How many?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Red, white, green, black, blue was one of them at a time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They call themselves the Chroma Conclave.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Eight total.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: The Chroma Concl-- there were eight?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's four of them. There's four of them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, you're-- you don't double them by city. It's just one city-- No, never mind. Just one dragon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One, three, five, eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vanessa's crossed her arms and thinks for a second and she goes, "Ah, if what you say is true, "this is very unfortunate. And a bit larger than what our simple guild could even hope to really "help. This would be something to take to the various temples."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, and we plan on it, but we know that the Slayer's Take is full of very strong, very qualified fighters and we were hoping to have you at our side as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well. Let me put it this way. If what you say is true, multiple incredibly powerful ancient "dragons roaming, destroying-- this is not something you can throw yourself at until "eventually one or the other falls. You have to find a weakness, you have to find the way to be on "their level. Ask around. See what other allies you can find."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A metallic dragon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Temple of Bahamut.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What you say is correct. These are the first moments after us finding out, this is a first step. But being members here and seeing what your people can do [no audio] I know this is just a first step, and we're about to enter Vasselheim proper, but--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It should speak pretty loudly that we came to you first. That's how much we trust you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can we count on you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sighs) "I am Huntmaster of the Slayer's Take. I deal in contracts, I deal in business, I "deal in the hunting of relatively unorganized creatures. This-- this is beyond me. That is not "to say I would not be willing to help, but there are many things to consider first. Perhaps you "should speak with Osysa."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What, who?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Osysa."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Osysa?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The sphinx.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Our patron of Ioun."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "She would have a better mind for this than me, this is..."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How do we talk to her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The same way you did last time."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Follow me."

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Before we go, I believe we have a little settling-up to do?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I'm cold and I still haven't been paid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "My apologies. Mertin!" He's over there, he's currently putting the head into a small case and closing up and he goes, "Aye, not to worry I'll be more than happy to get this for you." And he leaves for a second, comes back, goes through the contract, reads a couple things. Pulls out a large chest and begins divvying up coin and throws a satchel to each of you that contains, for both of you divided for this contract that would come to 2,250 gold pieces.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Pleasure, as always.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They have more than we do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, they don't.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Thank you very much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course, that's what I'm here for!"

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: We had a rather good time with that one.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Interesting trying to track it down, that's for damn sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What was it hiding as, by the way?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: A plethora of different entities and beings, it was running around town changing at will.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Isn't that like that rakshasa you were talking about?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It seems familiar, actually.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Does sound familiar. That was interesting and bloody!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yup!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's probably a purpose to that. Pushing up the steps again, Vanessa puts her hand up and tells you all to stop and calls out again. "Osysa! I "apologize to bother you, but we have a predicament that I believe requires your attention." As a moment passes, where once again you hear the low, rumbling growl in the shadows. (growls) You hear slams of giant footfalls across stone as what little bit of light torches begin to spark to life around the top of this platform, this stone platform. And at the very top of this staircase that leads to the top of where this platform ends, you can see standing above it a very large female sphinx with a lion body, a female head adorned with golden jewels around the neck, eyes that are light sky blue and white in color. Proud as these giant griffin-like wings stretch out and the entity comes to rest at the top, paws folded over the edge. "Yes, I recall. So what do you need of me?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, go for it, Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Your help, potentially. The world is under attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The head sinks for a moment. "I have been watching by the heartstone, naught but this past "day I have been keeping tabs in hopes that such a cataclysm would not find its way to my mate. It "has not. So. Being aware of this, what do you ask?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there anything that you know of that could help us defeat these ancient beings?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She thinks for a second, steps up and closes her eyes. As her muscles tense, her eyes open again, that color flashing with this luminescent blue color. And her voice falls even deeper into her register, and almost has this monotone informative projection that says: "The Vestiges of "Divergence, relics wielded when the gods walked and fought alongside their creations." The light fades from the eyes, for a second she catches herself and steps back.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: May I ask, what are the Vestiges of Divergence?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Leading into the penance, the Second Spark. These "were armaments. Objects of great power that were used in these wars against the gods, good and "dark. Many have been buried, entombed, lost, forgotten. The few that are recovered are passed "on through blood lines, through symbols of power and of seats of great political importance. But "the actual information is lost to me."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you know of any one in particular?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She concentrates for a second. "Not within my field of vision. Objects of this powerful "enchantment are also prone to want to keep themselves hidden."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's convenient.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Osysa. If you are aware of this knowledge, then you know that Vasselheim is one of the only remaining cities still left standing. Are there any other services you can offer to help us fight this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You may be hard-pressed to convince others to step beyond the walls knowing that such a danger "could use that to their advantage and destroy the greatest city that we know of. You are welcome to "ask, but it will be a difficult journey. What I can offer, though: my mate is a keeper of much "hidden knowledge, over on his side of Tal'Dorei. I may be able to send you to him to seek this "information."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Much hidden knowledge?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: About these Vestiges, perhaps?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does he serve your same god? Or another?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I am one of the chosen of Ioun. He does not serve her directly."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And we have been impressed by your wisdom, very much so. The people you employ are chosen very carefully and very well and we all have been impressed. In addition to information, you provide a service with the Slayer's Take to Vasselheim. Do you have any interest in spreading that influence to Emon, if we can save it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Her large paws cross once again, and she looks at you with a stern expression. "There is "great danger and darkness in this world, and there are many fools who stand up in hopes that they "can keep it at bay. If we were to lend our power to you, I would ask that you prove yourselves the "ones that could carry this torch."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How so?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Perhaps find these relics. Gather other allies. Prove to me that I would not be sending my "people to their doom. Then return. Perhaps then, when you think you are ready, we could lend our "guild to your service."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And where does your partner reside?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Understand that it is our nature to present "challenges. Part of his journey to seek him is to find him yourself. That is the first step."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does he have a name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is his name to give."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: One small question, Osysa, I'm sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You serve the goddess of knowledge, of openness.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does that mean you would know anything of the god of secrets: Vecna?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you say that name, she snarls. (roars) "It would do you right to not mention that name in this place."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I apologize.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, I know of him."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: His touch has been felt in the north.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Very close to here, actually. Would you know of a way to rid ourselves of his weapon, of his tool?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This creature is one of the few entities that "shrouds my vision. The limits of our sight, of the things we seek to discover and unveil, are "constantly balked by the veil of darkness he throws over the world. He may have been held at "bay, many thought destroyed hundreds of years ago, but no, he stays. And he squeezes a stranglehold "on everything we seek to accomplish."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And we will seek your partner and we will find your partner. We're not trying to score points, we are trying to do right. Percival?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What do you know?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Dark creatures attempted to, as best that we can surmise, open a gate beneath the castle of Whitestone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Whitestone." She steps back for a second, her eyes flare up with energy again. You can see the heartstone embedded in the floor of the stone glow even brighter and brighter as she puts her paws in the side and peers into it. She begins to mutter beneath her breath. "I can see the snowy "north of Tal'Dorei, the castle. Beneath, one of our corrupted temples, forgotten long ago."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Your temples?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Her head turns for a minute, her vision and face staring in the distance. "I look out to follow the "anger, the swath of death and hatred. Those who took Emon, they draw my gaze. Something is "happening."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right now?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What do you see?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The path to Westruun, eastward."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's east of Westruun? Who has the map?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "An army sundered. People ruined. The Conclave, sated, returns towards your land once more." You can see blood pouring out of one of her nostrils now. The light dulls in her eyes and the heartstone fades for a moment. She gathers herself. "I peered too far beyond the veil that "contains me, I'm sorry. My (pained grunt)--" She plops down and is breathing a little heavy.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Can I heal you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Brother Kashaw. It would be appreciated."

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Puts his hand around the medallion. Closes his eyes. Puts his hand out, touches her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you." She steps up and bows her head to you. She steps to the top of the temple once again. "I've seen this darkness you speak of under Whitestone, and I shall speak out to our brethren "of Ioun in hopes of discovering the nature of this shadow. I'm sorry, I must rest."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We thank you for your time. We are your willing allies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Return when you have proven yourself."

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: We shall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "When you think this Conclave could possibly be felled beneath your weapons and might and "will." She whips around the wings (whoosh) as the torches atop the temple flare out and you can see the edge of Osysa's form as she dives into the shadow to the back of the temple. You can hear the impact of giant footfalls against sand and then silence.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Zahra.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You said, "We shall." Have we convinced you?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Knowing that there are four dragons, at least--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: At least.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Four to eight dragons, according to Grog, out there. And after our dealings with Rimefang, I cannot let this go. You know I cannot, Kash.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Z, this is fucking happy fun bunch over here. They bring death with them everywhere they go. This isn't our fight.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Not all of them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't kill very much at all.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Good to know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Didn't you kill the king of--?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Except for kings, all right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We just had a third-party perspective.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No? No?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: It's nice to know Burt Reynolds is still around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And to think, I might have briefly missed you." (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should leave the temple.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, did Osysa just tell us she could possibly send us to her partner?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She told us where he is, and we have to find him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh,

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: You have to find the no-name guy who's going to help you find the stuff that's hidden that nobody knows where it is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought we were finding the stuff that's hidden while we're finding him.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: We will find her mate, he who is not named.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Well, as long as it's not convoluted.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He is south of the Frostweald, in the mountains.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I hate to thay this--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeth?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Speak freely.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So, these Vestiges are ancient, right? Spread across the land. Wasn't Tiberius looking for a bunch of objects of magic that his people had sent him to find? Perhaps that's the reason Draconia was hit. Maybe they were trying to hide these items.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's possible.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a big "what if?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you really think the Mending Wheel, though, would help us against Thordak?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel like we'll know if it's an ancient Vestige of Divergence.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is good. This is a path for us to walk.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: So, Draconia is gone. Is that my understanding?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, most likely, yes.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: What else is left?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Vasselheim. Whitestone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Zahra, Kash?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Potentially Syngorn, even though it's hidden.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Well, we can either stay here or we can--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're opting out of the conversation.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have either of you been near Pyrah, in the mountains east of here? Have any of you been where the Fire Ashari reside?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I have not.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Going to have to make our way there, eventually.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A lot to do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a lot to do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe we should split up into eight groups.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, 11 groups.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: That would be 12.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How many is that, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we know how far away the Frostweald is from here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Frostweald is back in--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: By Westruun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: South of Westruun.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like where we started, right? In Stillben.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was where you got the heart of the nymph.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's not far from the Air Ashari, correct?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you think she's still there, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah, trust me. When you have Grog-- you never leave?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's the expression, I'm pretty sure that's the expression.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to find Kima, we need to go to the Temple of Bahamut.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, you're right, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Talk to people that are capable of helping us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We need Kima. Potions first. I don't want to bore Kima, then Kima. Yes?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, does the Slayer's Take have potions we can just have? Don't they have like a supply room?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It would be welcome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We have things we can provide, as you are members."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh good, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Mind you, not extremely active members as of late, but..."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But we will be. Think about the giant amount of claws and teeth and eyeballs and leather wings and scales.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're about to get really fucking active.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're going to be so fucking rich.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Think of the armor I could forge you from red dragon parts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I give advantage if I go like this the whole time?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, how about 12?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Come with me."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aw, she likes us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I could have gotten something really badass if I had rolled better.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, you guys step up and you lead back to the Slayer's Take guildhall. She snaps at Mertin, whispers something in his ear, and he comes and offers a small chest to you guys that contains two potions of healing and one potion of greater healing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh good, two potions! Vanessa--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's welcome, it's very welcome. Which way is the potion shop from here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Go to the Quadroads."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Quadroads, of course.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, we haven't been here--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In quite a while--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As you know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm afraid your symbols have been getting dusty."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hm?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You don't have any potions left?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I've got like, three potions.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who doesn't have any potions?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: None.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: None.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I have a couple.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, I'm squishy as hell, can I have one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You get the greater one. You get one, and you get one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: May I speak with Vanessa very quickly?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Zahra, what can I do for you?"

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Kash, come with.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Kash walks over with her.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Vanessa, we've done many jobs together. And I think we've been very loyal to you. We've brought in a lot of money for you. My only request is, is there anything extra? Are there any spare potions, any amulets of protection, anything? You know this is going to come to us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And there is a lot of great money that you've made that could pay for these things."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispers) But her voice is so deep!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've given you already more than I needed to. You can afford it. If you were broke and "asking me, maybe I'd be happy to ask, but I just paid you quite a sum of money."

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I know you did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I feel like I'm being taken advantage of."

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I meant no offense whatsoever. I mean you no offense.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You wish potions, there are those that purchase them. I've already given you what I have and what "you've earned."

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: And we thank you for that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you, Vanessa.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vanessa, hey. I'm not asking anything. We're going to get you into Emon. That's a promise.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I look forward to you coming back and proving me wrong."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're going to double your fucking business.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mm, we're going to bring you so many scales. You just wait.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In all sincerity..."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "... leave." (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But good luck, and don't stray too far. Stay safe, "please? I put a lot of faith in you."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, to the potion shop. To the Quadroads.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, oh, wait! One thing. I know we're going.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mirrors.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: (laughs) No! (clears her throat)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I attempt to read lips.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is Lyra around? Anywhere?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Aldor, sit down, it's okay. Ah, not at the moment, she's currently helping her uncle."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: At the place where he is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In town?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The place where we got a lot of stuff.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: We got the horses last time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He's the ambassador."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cool. Thank you.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: As they're leaving, can Kash pull Zahra aside really quickly? Are you going with them? Seriously?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: What do you want to do, do you want to stay here while the world burns?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Because we're here. It's warm, we make money.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Not if nothing's left to protect. Not if there are no monsters left. If these things get out, if they spread their fire across the globe, what's left for us?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: If, if, if. If any of the monsters we miss went out and spread-- the world's always ending, baby!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: They just took out Draconia, darling. All of it. Gone.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I'll follow you. Anywhere. You know that.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I know. And I'll follow you.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Tell me what you want to do and I'm there.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: For a while.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: If we don't like it, we'll leave. If we find something better.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: They don't need to know everything that we have.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Fuck that.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: We might need it.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Then hide half the gold. I don't trust the twins as far as I can throw them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can read your fucking lips.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Oh yes, I'd forgotten that. All right. She knows how much we have. We're going for a while.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Was I wrong, by the way? Did you see how hot Keyleth is?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: She's fucking hot.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: That's what I'm saying. Let's go, we should go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're so nice!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What the fuck is that about?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you guys head out of the Slayer's Take guildhall into Vasselheim, which is now a little more bustling than it was when you arrived. It's about midday. The sun is still not visible. There's enough cloud cover where you can see where it would be in the sky, but it's still pretty grey. No rain, and there is still relatively recent snow that covers most of the city streets, some of which has been pushed to the sides to make walkways easier. It's been snowing here in the winter rather often, as you two are both very aware. You have multiple things you want: the potion shop, there's the Platinum Sanctuary, I think last time you mentioned the Trial Forge.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you guys want to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Potions first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So you make your way to the Quadroads.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I pull him aside as we're walking there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And ask, so, I thought you were interested in Keyleth. Am I wrong? I mean, you're interested in Keyleth. Right? I mean, I know you don't want to tell me. I know you don't tell me anything like this, but-- is it weird that he's here?

lines.name: LIAM

lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Don't you think the Slayer's Take-- should I run back and talk to Vanessa?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Vanessa has to have maps somewhere.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: She's got to have one somewhere. You need a basic map of Vasselheim, is that what you're speaking of?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It would not be a terrible thing to have, considering we're going to be traveling.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Of Vasselheim? Or of--?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The world.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The continent is Issylra. Issylra is a very large continent. It's almost the equivalent of Asia and Russia, like that whole-- it's very wide and a lot of it is wild and untamed land and wilderness.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let me top up a bit on what I need.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll need you as well because you hold the purse strings.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who's got the potions?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hmm?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who's got the potions?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have the potions.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I divvy those out, please?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ah, I'm so fast, but I'm really weak. Can I have another one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I already gave you a greater.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know you did. But I get fucked up really easily. Could I have another one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I give-- wait, how many people are there? Eight of us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So there was a few regulars, yeah?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just another, one more.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah. I'll give you two normies.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And everybody else gets a normie as well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll take a normie.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who gets the supe? And the great?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who's our weakest?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (clears throat)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, you're pretty weak. Take a greater, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The two poor decision makers, I imagine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's that, Smoke Man?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog, do you want the other greater? Yeah, take the other greater. And then I have one superior. How many hit points does a superior heal?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A superior heals 8d4 plus eight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's low.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's not that many. It's 5,000 gold?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, no. No, healing potions are generally a rip off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What a waste.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh my god, there's like a whole trade of really talented magical practitioners that spend their time crafting and brewing up these potions in the hopes they can save your life in the future.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's this character called? What's this character called?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's true, I did buy a book to learn alchemy, and I just haven't had time to do it.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: It's a great read, trust me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The alchemy book? Yes?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we fucking buying anything else or what are we doing now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Black powder.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He needs the Bang Bang Man.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's go get some powder. Let's get some black powder and whatever else we might--

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Boomstick needs the bang.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: While they're buying powder, I'm going to go get a fucking drink somewhere.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh! Yeah!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll meet you at the pub.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll go with Scanlan and Grog.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I'm going to go to the pub as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going with Percy. Go get a drink.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to go to the pub.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you are, you bad, intimidating motherfucker!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Abundant Terrace area.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Are you coming to the pub?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I'm going to help-- no, I'll see you in a bit.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I'll take care of her. We'll be fine. Don't worry about it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dagon is the owner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, yes. The two taverns you've been to is that of the Bellows' Respite Inn, which is in the Braving Grounds. So yeah, you can go to either one of those.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. Grog, would you rather go to the one near the Braving Grounds?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or this one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Up to you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't start any fights, we have a dragon to kill.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, shot-caller, pick one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, whatever's closer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Closer would be the Bellows' Respite, that's also where the Crucible was, the one that was on the outside of it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Better ale.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Old stomping grounds, Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys go get drinks. Who's going--?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Vex and I are going and-- are you coming as well?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: How far are we from the Slayer's Take, and is there any other place in town that I personally would know of from being here about three months, to find a map?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They have basic maps of the nearby countryside. A lot of the contracts require you to travel across this side of Othanzia. You go back and you talk to Vanessa and you procure one of the maps there that are usually supplied for one of your missions.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: All right, and then I'm going to the bar to get a fucking drink.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so most of them are drinking. Vex and Percival head-- you guys are all heading actually in the same area, to the Braving Grounds outside the Trial Forge, since that's where the bar is and that's also where Victor's little powder-covered hovel is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bring him out. Bring him out!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So (laughs) as you approach the same area, you can see that the building is the same as it was before, other than it's missing half a roof.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He might be a bit low on powder.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It appears to be haphazardly covered with a series of boards that were nailed to keep things closed, but there is definitely, with the snow and the rain, it's probably not the best place to be staying or living.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to remove my coat. As I've learned.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we have Trinket with us?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, of course.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to put my coat on Trinket for a moment, just to keep it clean.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A walking coat rack, that's what Trinket is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Percy, that's not a good idea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket's trying to get the coat off.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hello?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some movement, and you hear the shattering of glass and you hear a (frustrated noise).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Victor, are you in there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Just a moment!" Suddenly the door, whoosh!, slams open and before you, you see Victor, half covered in soot, has a big old thick pair of glasses on his face, one of which is cracked. You can see his chin now has this puffed out, partially burnt and curled bit of a goatee at the very tip of his chin. He looks up at you with these giant eyes that are projected and magnified by his eyewear. "Can I help you?!" (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, it's Percival. Do you remember me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No!" (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Excellent.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Is that all?!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was hoping to procure some black powder again. We had a-- we made a deal last time--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, yes, come in, please come in!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I have to? Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He turns around and heads back inside.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to stand out here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's quite wise. Please keep my jacket clean.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you enter, indeed, a good half of the roof is missing and you see now a lot of things have been moved away because currently there is a pile of burnt and destroyed wood splinters that are also soaked through, and there's a little bit of mold and rotten mildew that has gathered in that far corner as well, from the weather.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to stand over here and fail to stay in character, okay? (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You should roll for that. You're looking well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Heh, heh! Mostly." He turns around and you can see now, what you failed to notice when you first started this is where once there was five, there is now three fingers.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, he has character progression! (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's impressive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Learn from my mistakes!" (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can learn three more times, easily.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can. Three, four-- yes!" He runs off and starts rummaging through a bunch of stuff.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Victor, I was hoping you would have some black powder for sale.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm on it, I'm on it! Hold on!" He whips around with this metallic cylinder that is very well sealed. "See, I learn from my mistakes!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's very impressive. Oh--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He walks very carefully, very gingerly placing it on the table. "Okay. Carefully." He pulls out (fwoosh) a small torch. "I have to unseal the metal."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try and bap the thing down as quickly as I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You smack it out of his hand.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's... I trust you implicitly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Black powder." (cackles) (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think you've had enough. I'm going to smell the coffee. It's really coffee?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sorry, trying to host. It's been a while since I've had a guest. Would you like some?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just one spoonful would be quite--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes over to a small kettle and begins straining it through. He's got this little coffee brew on the side. "So, real black powder. Wait! I do know you."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You've purchased before."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Return customer. Not many of those."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not many? Have there been others?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He pours a couple of cups for you, pulls it over to you. "Oh, one. Months ago."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Really? Who would--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Nice woman. Young, good outfit, well dressed, heh."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Excellent. She didn't happen to say where she was going, did she? By any chance?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, no. Weeks, not months. Time-- strange."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Weeks? Very good to know. Thank you, that's so helpful. Did you talk about anything else with this nice young woman, at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No! She paid well!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm sure she did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Kept her distance."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You should get that looked at some point. Three more, three more.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Three."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percival?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes! So any black powder that you have, I would be happy to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Help you pay for a new roof, maybe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, I have to fix that."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You do. Money can help.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Explains the cold." He smears black right across the front of his face.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Doesn't it, though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's like gelled in with whatever mucus had been captured in there as well, streaked across.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that's not a mustache. That's so-- ugh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He comes back and he's now keeping, previously it was out in the open, he's learned his lesson. He has these glass vials, similar to what they put potions in, but now he's filling them with powder. And he brings out about four of them. "This is as much as I will spare. I already "sold a lot recently to the lady. I have my own tinkering to do, but if you wish to buy these?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I would be happy to sell."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That would be lovely.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay. Process of distilling, drying, preparing, 250 gold!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think that's very fair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Wondrous! Deal, deal."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Vex?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 250 gold, if you'd be so kind.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That much?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to make you something lovely.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (singsong) I love you!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're welcome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hiiii!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: H-hi. I give the money to Percy to give to him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Would you like some coffee?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Victor! Thank you, you're so kind. And if you would be so lovely as to not mention us to my friend if she should happen back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "50 gold."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, shit!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tell you what, Victor. I don't think you want to tell her anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion roll.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All you need is a five.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, wait, wait. 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Given the circumstance, he has a really low DC on this, so I'm glad this is the one you rolled a 12 on. He goes, "For you? I saw nothing!" (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I love you, darling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He catches it and he grabs a glass vial and puts it in and caps it up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Keep it safe, dear.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Until we meet again. All of us. Until we all meet again. Always a pleasure. Ah, keep safe, and--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Keep safe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Will do."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Close the door when you're done!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If I may-- (cheering)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're welcome, Internet. You're welcome.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was amazing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, man. Hire that fucking fool! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How'd it go?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: (drunkenly) Wait, wait, wait, wait-- okay-- okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wow, you've been drinking.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Grog, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: The first time I ever saw you, you were fighting... the Hammer? Who were you fighting?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep, yep, Hammer, Hammer.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: You were fighting the Hammer. So I went away and I made you... a hammer. And I'm gonna give you the hammer.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You made me a hammer?!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I did! That's what I do. I like to forge things.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I do. So I made you a hammer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does she not drink very much?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Not very much at all.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is amazing! I love hammers!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: And I put my crest on it. It's a moon. It's a full moon.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You said she was lush, you didn't say she was a lush.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it like a moon hammer?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I want you to have it.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Z, you gotta slow down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, never!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't-- you don't have it now?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I'll give it to you before we go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I go and I sit next to Kashaw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Keek.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? Hi.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How many of those have you had?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Less than five?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Two or three.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Three? Two, three?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Enough to where it's fun.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's blurry. You should join us! You all have to catch up. Come on! Life has been hard! Come on.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Come on, Burt!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A barkeep comes by, a human gentleman you recognize from before as Once-Lucky Ned, who had originally given you some information. Comes by, puts the drinks down. "I thought it was you!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Heh, heh. Phillip! Phillip! It's good to see you."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, no, it was-- it was Philip before, and now it's Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, he beat the name out of you. That's harsh."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, no, no. That was the first time, and then I came back and won my vengeance. Right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right, right."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You want to be known as... I see (clicks tongue). I got you."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Grog, Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Grog the Phillip is in town! Should anyone wish to take the title of the Crucible, this would "be the one to talk to. Heh-heh."

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Woo!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Faces turn, then go back to business.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is Zahra the only one that claps?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Woo! Ooh! (laughter)

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Oh, Z. Oh, Z.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Shut up, Kash.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have missed you guys. I've never met you! But I missed you guys.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I've missed... you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we need to catch up a bit. Vax, Vex, let's all have a toast to the inevitability of the universe, please. A cheers.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Which one of us? What was that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Vex and Vax. We're having a toast to the inevitability of the cosmos.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A toast? We're toasting? At a time like this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We are.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look, there's never not a good time to toast.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Is there a better time to toast than when the world is gonna end?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Exactly.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: We're about to lose everything, we might as well celebrate what we've got.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I toast to celebrating the end of the world with the best friends we could possibly have.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm, I'm, I have something to say to this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, Percy, well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have something to say.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, Percy, come on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: An innate sense that the world is moving in a direction--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fuck the dragons! (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There is an inevitability to the goodness of the universe--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (slurred) Inevitability.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There is something to fight for, damn it!

lines.name: SAM, TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck the dragons!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Here's to fighting for something more than just money.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (slurred) Inevitability.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would rather be with you all than the finest people in the world.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cheers to that, because God knows we're not the finest.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: When you find them, let us know.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I agree with you about the inevitability of the universe. The inevitability is that it's always shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's stones that are thrown into the river. There are stones that are thrown upon the river, but the river always moves.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: It's true, but you're not talking about the fish that's killed by the stones that's thrown into the river.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I go and find the barkeep?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, Once-Lucky Ned is there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Remember, right? It's just Grog. It's not like "Grog the Phillip." It's just Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, I apologize."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, it's all right, it's okay. So, does Earthbreaker Groon, does he ever come in here? Big guy, muscley, long, like, stringy--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I know of him. He doesn't come in and drink, no. He spends most of his days over there in that big Trial Forge Temple of Kord."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He never comes out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He'll go into the city on occasion. But he's one of them, how do I put it? 'Medititive' types."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "Medititive"?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sleeping while standing up. It's weird."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? I don't understand. How do you do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You'll have to ask him."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "Medititive."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Meeting of the minds.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. Is he like--? All right. Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No worries. I mean, if I recall, he actually came and saw your last bout."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, he did! And I want to like go see him, but I don't know anything about "medititiveness," like sleeping standing up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Go over there to the Trial Forge! He's seen you once, maybe he'll say hello again."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What should I, like, bring him a gift?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know. I don't ever talk to him."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No clue."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. And I flip him a silver. Bing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're just talking (laughs). All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sighs) What is it, like, noon right now? (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (singing) Day-drinking!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, no, it's probably about 1:30, 2 o'clock in the afternoon.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: (slurring) Kash and I just got back from frikkin' and it's time to drinkin'!

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: We haven't even eaten yet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, (laughs) I lost a fourth of my civilization!

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: That is funny.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow. That went dark.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we find Kima next, or should we spend the day here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that's right, we still have work to do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, we do have some very inebriated--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I think we've accidentally gotten shit-faced.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I can just walk and not do anything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, no, she can manage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe if we hang here long enough Kima will show up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. We're drunk. Here's what we should do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not drunk.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You ready?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm not drunk.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not either.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We should go watch Grog fight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What? There are dragons in the world, right now! And we're fighting? We're going to watch a fight?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We need-- listen to me. We need Kima with us, but Kima doesn't have time for fucking drunkards. You might not be, but some of us are a little drunk. So, while that's going on, we wait a day, right? And while that day is going on, we watch Grog pummel some person's face in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Plus, when I was a little girl, we used to be taught that if you were ever lost in the forest, to stay and hug a tree.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't hug him, Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And someone will come and find you.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I like this plan.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So if we stay in one place and this ale is like our tree, okay? We hug the ale and Kima will show up. That's my theory.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: While this is happening, Vex, you glance over her shoulder to the entryway to this bar, and you see stepping in, a familiar, burly looking half-orc gentleman.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Damn it, I was hoping it was Kima!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That would have been hilarious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He walks in, wiping his hands from dirt in the mines, stops, looks over at your table. Slowly backs out of the tavern and steps back out into the thoroughfare.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, look at that guy who went out the door! He looked like that guy you fought in that ring.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That guy, yeah. Go get (stammering) do it again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I run after him, out the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Make a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, come on, Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18. You step out in the front of the tavern, and immediately to the left, you see him ducking into the alleyway.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait! Kern! Kern! And I take off running after him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You turn around the corner and you see his back is against the wall and he has sweat dripping down his brow. "Hi."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey. Funny seeing you here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I run up behind Grog.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why are they acting like they fucked?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Things been good?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point--

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Did you guys date?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're ex-lovers!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks down. "Still a little sore."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "How about you?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: When I chew, my jaw goes to one side. It's fucking weird.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you guys all right, then? Everything's fine?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, I'm going to go, grab a drink.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So, I meant to ask you, that big, muscly, like long stringy white-haired guy that was watching our last fight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, yeah. The Earthbreaker."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Who is he to you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I talked to him once. I'll level with you. Went "to him for a little training after our first fight."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Um. Says I'm a little too angry to pursue his path."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Angry?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I got a lot of pent-up rage the way I was raised." (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Family issues? Tell me about it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Tell me about it. (chuckles) Well, half my folks are bloodthirsty, wandering barbarians in "the Northern Wastes."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No way! (laughter)
