lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah. What, you think being a half-orc's great? No! It's bullshit!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know! You think goliath is any better? It's the same fucking thing!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "At least you're made for this weather! It's cold out here!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's true, it is fucking cold out here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, it is."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can only imagine. I'm really sorry I took your lip off, by the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sorry I took yours off, too."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's true. Mine healed better.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, so. When you trained with him, because you were doing all that yoga pilates stuff. Did it help you out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, obviously not, really."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. What did he ask in exchange for the tutorial?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He didn't ask for any pay. He--"

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Oh god, what did he ask for?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He told me I had--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (mutters) Pretty eyes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "--to help someone." (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Help someone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He still hasn't given me the proper details yet and he hasn't called in the debt, but he told "me one day, I was to help him test someone, and he'd train me."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In that Trial Forge, are there like, more of him, like a bunch of big, jacked-out guys in there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not as big as him, no. But there's plenty of others that train under him. All sorts of "warriors. Weapons of all kinds. It's Kord!" He looks over, and you see in the distance, the giant statue of Kord that sits atop the Trial Forge. He looks over and with a look of reverence, gives a nod, and you can see that this man, a glimmer of faith in his eyes. He himself probably a follower of Kord as well. "He's a great man. I'm not the right temperament, it seems. But that's fine. He's "getting along okay."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Aside from the Slayer's Take and the Trial Forge, if you had to find men at arms, men to attack a very large foe, possibly quite dangerous, where would you go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Probably the Platinum Sanctuary. Between them and the Trial Forge, that's most of the "actual army. Most of it's Trial Forge. It's part of what the Braving Grounds are about. They train "the armies here, it's where they breed warriors."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Most of the Bastions that look over the city are trained here, so it's-- those are my best "bets, at least. Not much of a political man."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, it's been good seeing you. No one hit quite as hard as you did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You too. Um. The medal was a joke. I was in a sore place. Literally, a very, very sore place."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Uh-huh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I wanted to apologize for that."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Uh-huh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I should go." He starts walking past you, out into the main street.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Kern. Kord's strength to you, my friend.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow. Wow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I go back into the tavern.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you kill him, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep, yep, there's a lot of pieces of him all over the alley!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's my boy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I like, left nothing to find. It's great.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I walked out and they were making out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shut the-- that is

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mugging down in the alleyway.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh, Grog! I didn't know you swung that way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Swung what way?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Toward-- never mind.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Swung your axe.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Could I have another cup of coffee here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course, coming your way."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No man's-- you know-- goes straight on. Goes a little bit to the left, a bit of--

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Some men go straight on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I go sit down next to Kash.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I sit down next to the other side of Kash, in between him and Keyleth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to sit and watch right next to you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (yelling) Another drink!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How about, Keyleth, not another drink.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How about you have some water, dear.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mm, it's been a long few weeks.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Come here, Keyleth darling, we'll get some coffee.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No coffee for me, thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You are handsome and capable.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Your eyes are two different colors, which is very interesting.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a little creepy, but other than that, you are very, very capable-- Percival, I'm having trouble focusing, so if you could sort of go behind Kash.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I don't know what's happening. I don't know what's happening. Is he hitting on me? What's happening?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, no. No, no, no, no. There's only one man for me.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All I'm saying is--

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: What man is that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (slurring) We could use your help, all right? I know you're a bit of a mercenary, but you are a very capable man and there is a lot at stake. There is a lot at stake. There are dragons, they killed-- I'm not going to get into it. But I implore you to look past yourself and please try to think of the greater world. (stuttering) I'm an admirer--

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: You've said several times that you're an admirer of mine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Very sweet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, one last thing.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Mm-hmm?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know what, never mind. I don't want to talk about that. And I wander off into the other side of the room.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I have literally no idea what just happened.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughs) He's a complicated man. He goes to dark places.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe you should go see what's happening?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (muffled) It's dark in this closet!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Go, maybe you should go see what is going on with my brother? Maybe you should go find out what's happening with my brother.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How do you get this closet door open? I can't get back out here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's stuck in a closet.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: It's all right. Girl talk. So, Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What. What. What?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I heard a little. I wasn't sure and I then saw you and I thought oh, all right, well, you know, yeah, all right. So, what, you know? With the what? (whispers) What happened? With him?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I literally never even had this experience in high school, it's throwing me.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: (whispers) Come on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know how to react to any of this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What is high school?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keyleth. She's talking about you kissing Kash.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh! Right! Oh!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: He told me. He told me a little bit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Funny you mention that, yeah, you know--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wasn't he your first kiss?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Do you like him?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Isn't that so wonderful?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I know, it's wonderful. Do you like him?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I, um, you know, okay, I'm kind of new to all of this. I don't really know what's going on?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: What, to talking? You're doing very well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you. I'm new to that as well.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Um--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll give you a helpful hint.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you're interested in someone, make sure they know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (breathless) Oh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And if you're not, then stop fucking dragging them along, because it's not fair.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: What if she doesn't know? What if she can't decide?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, you think I'm dragging Kash along? Oh no no no no no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure. You're dragging Kash along.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, he was just, I only spent a day with him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mmm.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was just a day.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vex! I can't get out of this closet.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Jesus.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is he really, truly stuck in a closet? Right now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought he was a lockpick.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughing) I go, I walk away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (mournfully) I rolled a one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is literally the only thing Vax is good at. He really can't get out of the closet?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: We've got them now!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can't get out of this closet as hard as I try.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are you doing? Stop it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Seriously though (quietly) I'm really confused.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I know, don't hurt him. He's wonderful.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: He's wonderful.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: If you do-- he's wonderful.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My god, I love other people's problems.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is amazing. Sorry about this, Kash.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: No, this has been wonderful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: When our party gets--

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I have men and women telling me I'm incredible.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You are very attractive.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: That's, wow, that's two.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just met you, and I don't know much about you, but are you more of a Vax man or a Vex man? Like, how do you roll? How do you--?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Would you be interested in the rogue or the ranger?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're identical.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Oh. Oh! I see what you're saying. All right, I get it. I go taco, not hot dog.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes! I love taco!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: High five it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Respect. Respect.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we sober yet? Can we go find Kima?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yes, we're sober!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think we need to go to bed.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yes. Let's get a break.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: After a brief time of coffee and a bit of sobering, you find yourselves of sound enough mind.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 17 hours later?! (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Coffee, coffee.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I metabolize things very quickly, you'd be surprised.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A few hours, two hours, let's say. It's four, five o'clock in the afternoon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Five o'clock?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or four o'clock. Four o'clock.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You find yourself clear of mind to continue onto your intended events for the day. With that, we're going to go ahead and take a break. We'll be back here-- (cheering)

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: (laughs) That was awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: [break]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back, everyone. So, before we get back into this, a couple quick announcements. One, if we get to 15,000 subscribers tonight, tomorrow's crew will be celebrating 15k and a Cosplay Day. All of our crew will be dressing up as their favorite characters all night. So you guys should go ahead and see if we can hit that number, because that would be awesome and hilarious and awesome.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I might have heard what some people are going to be dressing up as and I'm very excited about it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Also, a reminder that if you want to help support the channel, check out the Geek and Sundry Amazon Wish List. You can find the list in chat if you type "!Wishlist" there and that will give you access to it and you can see if there's any way you want to help build the channel and make it more awesome. So there's that. Liam will join us when he can. But we're going to jump in for the time being. So, as you guys exit the tavern, you look out into the Braving Fields.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I suddenly remember to go back and open the closet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh shit, we need to get the rogue out of the closet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is that, yeah. So you're in the center of the Braving Grounds-- we traded Liam for Travis.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Exactly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grog, can you get this door open? (laughter)

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: It is open, darling. Come on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we going to Kima now, or are we going to go see Grog fight?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is Grog fighting?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To your left, around the Heaven's Stair, the giant mountain that bisects the northern portion of Vasselheim, around that way, a little bit of travel, but that heads towards the Bahamut section of the city, where the Platinum Sanctuary is. To your vision, immediately outside the tavern, you can see the giant statue of Kord, where the Trial Forge is. And to the south of you is where the Quadroads are, in the southern regions. What do you guys want to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't really feel like fighting. I just want to go talk to Master Splinter at the Trial Forge.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, sure. All right, we can do that another day, maybe? Or do you want to--?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm not in a rush.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we go to the Platinum Sanctuary? Where Kima is, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's go talk to Kima.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, should we wait until some people are more sober?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: No, I'm all right, coffee helps. Coffee helps.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Walking will help.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Walking and coffee.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe we should-- they can wait outside or something.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But I miss Kima.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh Jesus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To put it nicely. All right, so where do you guys want to head into--?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Platinum Sanctuary.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's considered in very poor taste as everyone here is in some way, shape or form, to some level, is pious to some degree to one of the deities that are worshipped here. You find your way to the base of the stair that you recall, following when you first arrived here in Vasselheim, that leads up to the Platinum Sanctuary where you were delivering the Horn of Orcus originally.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, that's right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You follow it up the side and it is an extended staircase that curves up to these three silver spires that are pushing out from the side of the mountain, quite a ways up. After about almost 20 minutes of stair climbing, your legs start to cramp a bit, but you manage to make your way towards the top, the outside of the large stone doors. There you can see there are two Scalebearers of Vord, in their silver armor, blue cloaks at their back, weapons at the ready, just looking out. And as soon as you guys approach the top of the stairway, they change their stance to be a little more prepared.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (panting) Guys, this is hard to do with alcohol in your system.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Hard to do at all.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A lot of horses and chickens around here, too.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I noticed that as well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everywhere.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I didn't know this was a farming industry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hello there. Excuse us. We are of the Slayer's Take-- Is that a good thing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We are of the Slayer's Take and we ask for entry into your Platinum Temple.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Your business is with whom?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lady Kima.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Turns, nods to the other guy. They both grab these small handles and give a tug, and the door opens slightly and one of the guys disappears between the two doors. About 30 seconds pass to a minute, before he steps back out. "Your presence has been accepted by the Highbearer Vord, the "Silvertouched. He will greet you in the central chamber, please."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you. How do we address him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Highbearer would suffice."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Please enter."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Will Kima be there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He doesn't answer. The doors open even wider.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you guys enter the chamber once more, this is close to where you flew in in bird form and almost got arrested by the Highbearers.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Uh-huh, right, those guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, as you enter the chamber, you see a number of the guards have already assembled and they're giving you a walkway path, both as a presentory arrival vigil, but also making sure that you don't wander off the predestined path to the main central meeting chamber.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: But it doesn't seem antagonistic in any way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Just-- they're protecting their temple.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll make it that, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys continue inward, towards the central chamber, the high stone ceiling before you. You can see there are holes carved throughout the ceiling and the stonework that cause beams of light to come shooting through from the sky. What catches your interest in here is that the sky is cloudy. There is no specific source of direct sunlight, yet there are beams of light within the temple itself that form a pattern across the stone marble floor of the central chamber.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do a nature check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Certainly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's the pattern look like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The pattern resembles a large shield, when you look at it. It's pointed toward the base of where you guys are walking in and fills most of the chamber in an oval fashion, before coming together in a line towards the back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17? Okay, this definitely isn't a natural occurrence. The sunlight should not be projecting this way, which leads you to believe that there's something about the temple's enchantment or its construction that can either dissipate the veil of clouds to the sunlight or produce their own light to mimic it during all hours.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Do any of us recognize the symbol on the floor?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've seen-- the shield itself is akin to the symbol of Bahamut, which is a shield with a silver dragon head on it. You've seen Kima use it previously when you guys were looking after her in the Underdark.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We never got that stuff back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Her stuff?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys push to the central chamber, you can see there's a line of three heavily armored Knights of Bahamut that are all there, standing shields at the ready, big tower shields that almost touch the ground. Two of them separate to one side and one separates to the other, and in the center, arriving before you, is Highbearer Vord, the Silvertouched, who some of you are seeing for the first time. Long, light brown hair that crests down past his shoulders, his features are very elven, very soft and ageless, but there is a very faint bluish hue to his skin. His eyes have no irises, no pupils. Steps forward and extends his hands. "It is good to see such "friends, so I ask you once again to join me in this chamber. Can I help you?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispers) Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can, actually. Well, we hope that you can, as it concerns dragon matters. We know that you serve Bahamut, the great, the wonderful, the very metallic. These very terrible colored-- chromatic red, green, lots of different dragons, they've attacked--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How much do you know about the dragon attacks that have been raging across the world?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And I feared it was the work of our lord's nemesis."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Straight-up nemesis?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, can you elaborate?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He puts his hand up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "However, with much prayer of mine and my acolytes, we find no tremor of the Dragon Queen, "nor the stench of Baator, on this business."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dragon Queen Baator? Is that what he said? Baator?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Baator. B-a-a-t-o-r.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Is the Queen-- I'm sorry-- are the Queen and Baator the same?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a religion check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All of us or just--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of you, sure. Make a religion check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. None of these ring a bell, except for you, Kashaw. The Dragon Queen is indeed the nemesis of the Platinum Dragon, Bahamut. It is an entity known as Tiamat and is essentially the patron of most chromatic dragons. She resides in Baator, which is one of the Nine Hells.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eugh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, it seems that Vord is speaking in a way that, through much disturbed interest and prayer into this matter, there doesn't seem to be the scent of Tiamat's doing in this matter. And strangely, you see a bit of the tension in his face relax as he tells you this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So, if it's not the nemesis, the big nemesis, then you guys could probably take out these dragons, like, no problem, since they're not the Big Bads, they're just really bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And we stand because we hold vigil here."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But, sir, you should understand how close this destruction came from your doorstep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And yet it avoided our city. Do you know why? Because even such creatures know better than "to lend their talons against us."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But how do you know that will happen the next time? Is that always where you're going to place your bet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do you think this will be the first time that ancient dragons have attempted to attack our "fair city?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How about four?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can guarantee you, should they mount an attack on us, four or not, they will fall."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow, then I guess everybody in the world can just move here.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Wait a second, you said dragons have attacked before and they were defeated. How?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, we had the aid of Bahamut with us at that time." And he glances up and you look up and you can see the rays of sun that have come through here, from your current position, you can see actually form a matching symbol. Not of a shield, but of a giant winged dragon outstretched across the curved roof of this temple.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But let's talk about--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's saying something.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Please continue, I'm so sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My bad.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: We've been drinking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Drinking?"

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: No. Water. Long walk up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, understand. I hear your plight. And I understand that we must aid you in this endeavor, "best that we can. But we cannot swear to you our army."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What sort of aid can you offer, then?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, now, while you seek out whatever your plot is to tear these creatures from their summit, "we will grant to you, from our place in the Dawn City, our finest champion. While I have no "resources to offer at this time, this champion shall come to your aid to help in any way that "they can. And once they can report their certainty that victory can be had, perhaps we may be able to "send a little more of our power your way."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Will we know the presence of this champion or will it be a silent one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Your charge, Platinum Knight Udire, one of our finest warriors, whom has had time and time again--" At which point you hear a loud (clang) sound as all of a sudden, Udire's thrown off of his feet, his shield bent in and skidding across the ground. You see stepping up behind, a female halfling, scar across the face--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- gold-trimmed armor, blue cloak behind her, shouting out, "Oh no, you don't! This is my "home turf! I'm going."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kima!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, Kima!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll take that one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We want that one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Highbearer Vord rolls his eyes and sighs loudly. (growls) "Kima, you are in need of "discipline and guidance. More than most who walk the Warrior's Path! Your foolish impulses will get "you killed!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think her foolish impulses are

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Better to die a fool for something than live in "regret for doing nothing."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Church! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well. Your new charge is Lady Kima, whom you are already affiliated. Please keep her from doing "anything stupid."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Udire, it would have been a swell adventure with you, maybe next time. Sir, thank you for granting us this aid that we will definitely need in our journey. We also are new to this dragon-slaying business and would love your advice and any information you might have, especially about some specific items. Something called the Vestiges of Divergence?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's true that you need to prepare, arm yourselves "against this doom. While we are meant to stay here in the most holiest of places, these relics you "speak of from before the Second Spark still lie forgotten. Hmph, these elements even balked the "Primordials of old, blades that slew the Children of the Dark. Where these relics lie, only story "and tome can tell, unfortunately. Know that at any given time, you are not the only ones seeking this "power. Consider things of such great strength are perpetually in the minds of those who would make "their riches off of them or intend to take their own townships and peasantry under their own boot "and gauntlet. Well..."

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Do these Vestiges help you control the dragons? Do you become their leader if you find them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't believe any of that such capability, but I also am not a scholar of ancient "magics and artifacts. I have merely come across their whispers in books and various classes I took as a child."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What sort of books? Fairy books?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There are tomes scattered throughout the city. And there is the Cobalt Reserve."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cobalt Reserve is gone. The dragons took it out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That is unfortunate."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You said these tomes might still be in Vasselheim?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Perhaps."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I wish I could tell you. We had one such entrusted to us long ago, but that was destroyed "as part of the last assault on Vasselheim that we withstood."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you remember the description of any of the items from your stories?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or how many there were?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The stories say of at least a dozen. I can't be certain. I wish I could be of more aid in "this, but this is not a path that I chose to learn much on."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And are all artifacts necessary to defeating these dragons?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have no idea."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should probably have asked--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Osysa.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Though the warriors that once wielded these in the battles of old only seemed to have carried "one or two each."

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: How did you defeat them? The dragons that came to your doorstep?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That was before my time, my dear."

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: There are no legends, there are no scrolls that might recount the tale of how that happened, that you might still have somewhere?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: While you're doing that, Udire's stuck in his armor over there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dented in.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: He's just dented in, he can't get out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hold on. Got it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry. One moment please.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Right here, hold on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've got all my dragon lore over here. Just give me a second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But it was then the gods also decided that perhaps their delving had caused this, and they receded, "leaving the mortals to find their own way, to rebuild a second time, with the warning of the "dangers of arcane, which Vasselheim still to this day holds in its prime oaths. Many of these "Vestiges that you seek were destroyed, but some were kept, some were lost, some were entombed, "some were re-found and rediscovered and used as symbols of power. But since this Second Spark of "civilization, the gods felt that the true penance was the destruction of all their people had built, "and the gods leaving us to our own. Thus started the Penance, where to this day, we still make up "for the infractions and sins of our arrogant brothers and sisters of that day. So, since then, "we've had other new civilizations spring up: Wildemount, Tal'Dorei, Syngorn, Marquet. These are "the newer cities of the Third Age."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: May I ask-- Vestiges, the word in these legends, it seems vague. Does no one know anything about what they were? Is that a stand-in for things we don't understand or know about? What are these Vestiges?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We know of them. Understand, artifacts and relics of this power are very dangerous. And what "better way to hide things of such power than to destroy the knowledge of where they may be or even "if they exist?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sir, I come from the Ashari people.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We are here to protect those boundaries that we set several thousand years ago. Do you think that some of this knowledge might still be within my people?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is possible. I am not a practitioner of the history of the Ashari people."

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Objects with that much power have to leave some trace somewhere. Anything you can think of, a place to start.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Cobalt Reserve. There the monks keep some of the most ancient of texts. We here at "Vasselheim keep a watchful eye on things that relate to the wars of old, the history of our "deities, of our temples, to not repeat the mistakes we have. The monks are more eclectic "in their collections. Perhaps they can be of more aid."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe they have secret rooms underground, where they keep the most ancient texts. We should at least check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It would be worth looking, at the very least.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Allura was on her way there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Highbearer. These dragons who are running rampant across the world, them being chromatic dragons, do you think they have pledged their loyalty to the Queen?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If they have, it's a very-- no, they would not be able to shroud the sight of the Platinum "Dragon himself."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Isn't it very strange for dragons to pledge their allegiance to any other dragon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "For chromatics, it is."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then why are they serving the red one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The red one?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The Cinder King.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thordak.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what he calls himself.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's ancient. He was in the Fire Realm-- the Fire Plane and broke free. And now he has other dragons serving him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Chromatic dragons respond to a few things: gold, dominance, and strength. If this red dragon "is as ancient and as powerful as you say, perhaps he, even he, could bully lesser dragons."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or do you think it's possible he is offering any one of those rewards?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There are many possibilities. You would have to ask one of them yourself."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I get the distinct feeling we will get that chance.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So, if this is the Third Age, does that mean the Fourth is upon us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I hope not."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As do I.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But if it does, we will do everything we can to see that this city stands. It is the only "link we have to the past. Should Vasselheim fall, I dare say all is lost."

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: At the cost of everything else, Vasselheim stands? That's my only question.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That is your question?"

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Petty squabbles, selfish personal endeavors that "lead to foolishness and treachery. Should this city fall, and one of those remain, that is a "breeding ground for the dark powers that lie beyond the Veil. It is only here that those who "are the most devout could truly have the hearts and minds to guide us, Bahamut forbid, into a "Fourth Age."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, thank you for all your help. One more question before we leave you to your--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which you see, Kima slams her hammer on the ground. "Oh my god! Can we just go? I'm sick of "hearing him rattle on." Vord puts his hand out. "Kima!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On our journey, we may have to travel long distances quite often. Is there any means of quick travel to other parts of the continent from Vasselheim?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Perhaps any flying carpets that you have lying around?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Airships, teleportation circles, any means that you know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We do not deal in such teleportation magics beyond the divine-provided ones, and those I "assume are beyond most of you. However, there is still the Skyport, which I believe you arrived in "when you first came to us? Other than that, if none among you are able to achieve any sort of "distance translocation, then I highly doubt you have the ability to stand up against these dragons "you seek to destroy."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We got it. It's fine. It's handled.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you for the vote of confidence.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we have everything we need here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, unless you have any amulets or magical things lying around?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How's that Horn of Orcus going, by the way?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Good question, actually.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Shh!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ix-nay on the orn-hay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And with that--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So no on the magic items? Of protection?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have business for the day."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I'm not going to ask him how his family is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, don't do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Show our guests out, please." "With pleasure." Slings her maul up on her shoulder. "Let's step outside first."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She rushes out, gives hugs to everyone that she knows. She skips you, asks to be introduced to-- "And--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Zahra. Kima.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I'm Zahra.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Zahra, nice to meet you."

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Nice to meet you, Kima.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Kima. Lady Kima."

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Lady Kima. Lady. All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And have you met Kash? Kashaw.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Kashaw. Vesh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hmph."

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: All right then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You're brooding."

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, so. I caught some of that discussion. Dragons? What are we after here?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Big scary dragons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I tend to glaze over when he's talking."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Emon's gone, Kima.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, basically four big fuck-off chromatic dragons destroyed Emon and then Westruun and-- Allura was there, she was very upset.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Is she all right? Is Allie all right?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, Allie is fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We just parted ways with her-- (groans) I have such a headache.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Two days ago.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "My home temple's in Westruun."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should definitely go there. We need to look at the Cobalt Reserve as well. We need to meet up with Allura, though. She was-- (sighs).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, well. I'm with you. Wherever you need me."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just pass Vax my water canteen on the sly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I very obviously chug the entire thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A few of you started early. I'm jealous."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kima, it's been very hard since we last saw you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can see it on your faces. You all look a bit harrowed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hairy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You surprise me day after day, Grog."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why, thank you. Don't have to hide it around me, it's okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, where are we off to?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a good question.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where are we going?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Cobalt Reserve, he said twice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, but that's in Westruun.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's been destroyed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not necessarily, I mean yes, it's fucked up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We still need to go talk to Earthbearer Groon and see what kind of lesson was there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I also really need to check out the Fire Ashari.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fire Ashari are on the way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's count out the things that we want to do. Not what we're going to choose, just what we have to do, and then we'll choose something. We've got the Cobalt Reserve, which may or may not be totally fucked, right?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: It could give us information about these dragons.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We need to go by there regardless. We need to stop by Westruun.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. So there's Osysa's mate.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's down by Westruun.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Down by Westruun, in the mountains.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's on the way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. We've got your people.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Also on the way out the door.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It is?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's not far from here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's roughly three days' travel, southwest of Vasselheim.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But there's trees.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There are trees. I can also pop through a tree. I can pop through a tree through most places. Pop through a tree and get us to Westruun, as long as we take a nap.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Three options. Are we forgetting anything?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And Grog wants to talk to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Earthbearer Master Splinter.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Earthbreaker.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: While we charter a ship.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy really wants an airship. Dear gods, does he want an airship.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What a perfect way to make our way quickly and efficiently.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's just talk--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Quickly? Efficiently?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: You can go through trees?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Only trees she's seen and knows very well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But the Earthbreaker is here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Luckily, all places that we are going, we've been to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, if we're spiraling out, right? Earthbreaker's here, Ashari are close by, and then we're talking about in and around Westruun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. So let's go to the Earthbreaker.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, let's go to the Earthbreaker.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Followed by the Ashari.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Followed by the airship.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Followed by the airship.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Earthbreaker. As in Dawn Marshal? The great Dawn Marshal of--? (chuckles) I've only seen him "from a distance. He's a rough-looking fella."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, right. He's got a pair of arms on him, doesn't he?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm excited to see this." Puts it over her shoulder and she's walking down, her little legs (clanging) with her armor down the stairs.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hold up, Kima. Hold up. What do you mean? Have you spoken with him before?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've seen him punch someone's head clear off."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Off of his body?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is so cool.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: You only turn them into paste.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Level up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm excited.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Oh! Oh dear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) "You're not the only one!" And she continues rushing ahead. You get the feeling that Kima's been locked up and been doing temple stuff for quite some time and is very happy to get out of her general duties.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Lead the way, shitkicker!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys head back down the outside of the Heaven's Stair, making your way back to the outside of the Trial Forge. You can still see now it's middle of the afternoon, all the forges throughout the town are in full steam. You see big plumes of black smoke pouring out of the various steelworks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So, do you-- have you met Kima?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I get the feeling that you guys knew each other.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Bunch of your friends are just very weird.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You seem really put off by it. I didn't know it was so--

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I'm not used to being around people all the time. I have one real friend, and that's Z. I'm only with her because she saved my life. I'd do anything for her. Everybody else is odd for me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I feel that.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: There is one thing I wanted to say to you, though, about our kiss. I'm very happy that it happened. But I shouldn't have stolen it. And for that, I apologize.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You don't need to apologize. I also don't ever want to hurt anyone.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Physically or emotionally.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Nor me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you guys approach the outside steps leading up to the doors of the Trial Forge, you can see the large rust red-colored monument, Temple to Kord. Very rigid and very much a temple built to withstand. It's a fortress more than a temple. And you see above it still, across the lip at the very top at the front walkway, a little bit of the Kord statue, looking over the entirety of this section of Vasselheim.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh boy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The doors are actually ajar, they're open.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are two Dawn Marshals there in their armor with the colors of Kord. As you approach, they step out of the way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wouldst thou care to follow me inside?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's do this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Verily, verily.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Huzzah, I say, my Lord.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My liege.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you walk in, the two Dawn Marshals that are out there put their arms together and they lower their head and bow. And as you enter, they close the doors behind you guys. The doors slam behind you and you feel the stone shift from the impact of the thud. 25-, 30-foot-tall doors that mark the front of this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's all right. Pucker up, we're okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The echo of the stone slam down the long hall. You can see there are large pillars that mark the run to the central chamber. You've been here before, and as you walk across the smooth, very, very simple stonework ahead, you can see there is the central portion. It's almost like a giant cross, like both sides of the temple meet in the center. And there is a circular dip in the ground. Not really a pit, it's only about four feet down. But it's filled with a coarse sand, and as you guys walk up to that edge, each monk acknowledging you as you pass quietly, you can hear the gentle chanting in the distance of low, rumbling Gregorian voices, (chanting). And there, sitting in the center of this open circular sand patch, is the Earthbreaker himself. He is sitting there, legs crossed, arms resting at the edge of his knees, eyes closed. You can see, even from here for those who haven't seen him before, he wears simple free-flowing pants of a dark reddish color with a gold trim on the sides, but they're tattered towards the bottom. He has a one-shoulder wrap across the front there and these large prayer beads that hang around his neck. His skin is very dark and weathered by sun and training, and he is probably the most muscular human being you have seen for his proportional form, he is a human being built for discipline and physical martial training and battle. Older though, still you can see his long grey beard that rests about middle to his chest, the balding on the front a little bit, the rest of his grey hair rests to his mid-back, and he just sits there quietly in the center. The rest of the monks have gathered up and begun to form around the circle.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many monks, would you say?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now, about 15?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One-five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are they talking at all or are they all super-quiet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Super-quiet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I walk up to within 20 feet of Earthbreaker Groon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you leap down into the sandpit?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so, you guys on the side. Grog, you leap off.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How deep is it lowered?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know how deep it is, but it's, it's not, it's hard sand, it's packed, so you just kind of--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, but I meant the depression, is it like a couple feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, the depression's like an inch.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, you mean the depression into the actual ground?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About four feet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, shit. Yeah. So.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you vault into it in a bound.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does he move at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. He's still facing a little bit away from you in the far corner.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I put my fist in my hand and I bow slightly. Does he move at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The silence is broken immediately by a low, rumbling voice that seems to have no particular source in the vicinity where you stand. It says, "You come because your lands now harbor a terrible "conflagration. How do you think Groon can assist?" Still facing away from you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We have traveled near and far, great Grood.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like Sesame Street.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And we would like to request upon you a moment of your time?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Why is he doing the talking? Why is he doing the talking?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point he stands up, and, you know, would only come to about your sternum, height-wise, but he's just this tense, every muscle is seemingly, there's not an ounce of fat on this body and--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like a protein shake.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Paleo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This shall be a test to see if you will break against the shadow."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What shall be a test?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's the test?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I know many things, Grog Strongjaw."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He said my full name.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But such knowledge is earned, not given."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispers) Shit, you might have to fight this motherfucker.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Where do you find your strength?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispers) What's he talking about, Grog?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Moved three feet in an instant and has slammed you right in the center of your abdomen. The breath just escapes you as you fall back, unable to really catch yourself, and just land flat on your back in the sand.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (wheezing sounds)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're all hanging back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Puts his arm down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just watching.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Strongjaw. Where do you find your strength?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In my anger.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You walk between worlds. Weakness in mind or weakness in conviction. What do you stand for? "Where do you find your strength?" At which point, as you're getting up, there's another blinding flash for a second and your feet are left out from under you. Go ahead and make an athletics check, because you're now prepared for this one.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Jeez.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Gonna get smackdown.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your feet go out from under you as you slam onto your back, you just barely caught your breath before it's almost knocked out again. He's looking down at you this time, once again, his eyes just white. "Choose. Choose the two here who would save you."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (whispers) Pike's not here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Choose your bloody muses."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does he mean us, or?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do they have to be here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks over to the rest of you on the side of the pit. "Choose."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (sighs) I choose my buddy Pike.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's not here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't care, I just say it anyway. I choose Vax and I choose Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We give him his strength, sir.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you finish that sentence, two monks that you failed to notice were behind you shove both of you into the pit. Make acrobatics checks, both of you guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughing nervously) Not my kind of fight! Oh, I got a ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan is face-down in the sand.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we talking still?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would just like to point out that I am mostly sober.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Now. Show me your conviction."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh snap!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you three to roll initiative.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Natural 20! 25 off a natural 20!

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Oh snap! Shit's getting real.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The statues that're set at the edge of this, we're gonna put you, Grog, there--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Look at the coolness that's been created on this map!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And boom.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So cool! This is awesome, Matt!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Look how little they are!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll just move it this way a little bit, just so you guys can see, there we go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm peeing just a little bit.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Oh my goodness.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey you guys, don't die!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so. Let me get Groon's sheet out here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it just us against one person?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's really strong.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's gonna kick your guys's asses.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Can you see, do you want to switch seats so you can see? Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I can see on the screen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so. 25 to 20?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 25 off a natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. 20 to 15?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16, Scanlan. All right, perfect. First up's first. You, Vax. Just standing with his arm up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Click 'em hard!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And use my bonus action to hide behind Grog's thigh and hold my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Until what, what's your trigger?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Until Grog moves towards the Earthbreaker.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: When he does it I'm gonna go with him and fight him if I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, your movement is in your turn, it's your action you have to hold.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh boy. Oh boy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So. Are you gonna wait behind him?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, let me just think for ten seconds only.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Can't, you've got-- dude.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, okay, so, I use my bonus action to hide. Do I need to roll for that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. That's a--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ohh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So that is, that's a 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I guess behind Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He has no idea where you are.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I'm going to throw fucking daggers at this guy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because I'm first. Oh my god. I am. First is 24?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24 hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And then, so I used my bonus action to hide, which means I can do two, right? So the second is not that great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know what you're so worried about.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Using Luck. Better. Second is a 30.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, both hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, now. This is, I'm the first to attack, which means that it is-- Ooh, it's a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the range increment on this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm Sharpshooter, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, but what's the max range?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so. I'm hidden behind Grog so it should be sneak attack, and I'm the first to go so it's a crit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're the first to go, it is a crit. It is not a sneak attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's not a sneak attack? Even though I used my bonus to hide behind Grog's big fat leg?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where could you possibly be, Vax?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's huge! All right, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where could you have possibly hidden from his sight in the middle of this giant open sandy arena?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: He's disappeared!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm drunk and fighting in a pit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's okay. But it is double damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, all right. So there is no sneak attack, but it is crit, right? Because I'm the first to attack?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well no, it's surprise, not the first to attack. He is not surprised.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's not surprised.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. It's not first, it's just surprised.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh god. I'm drunk, tell me what's going on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hit him twice, roll damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know, I'm so confused.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Eight and eight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) That's almost as good as all those other things you did today.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The first one, he deflects with his hand and it cuts the arm and you can see the little slash of damage it dealt. The second one, he's gonna use his reaction to do deflect missiles.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's cool. That's some Bruce Lee shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Yeah. He reduces the damage entirely, spends one of his ki points, he catches the dagger and throws it right back at you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, I'm gonna use Uncanny Dodge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not back at you, though. Because you're currently behind Grog.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hi! (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you still face-down in the sand?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's going on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's 18 to hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you take 12 points of piercing damage. As he chucks Vax's dagger back at you, it sinks into your shoulder suddenly before it vanishes and returns to your belt.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I'm sorry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "My buddy Scanlan."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) That's true, that is all you heard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Groon is going to rush up to the front of Grog-- actually no, to the side here so you're both in combat, technically, and is going to make a flurry of blows attack using another one of his ki points. So that's gonna be four attacks, all against you, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cocked. 26.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) 27 and 26?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, it misses! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And 28.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that hits too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What the fuck is this guy's base? What?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you take--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's doing a lot of math.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 31 points of bludgeoning damage. And his kick just-- whack!-- right across the jaw. You haven't even raged yet, and the pain is intense, your vision goes white for a second. And go ahead and make a dex saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh man!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As his fourth action, sweeps your feet out from under you and you are knocked prone on the ground.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, shit. This guy's a badass.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He gets four actions?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Monks, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's his turn. Grog, you're up now.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: And we can't do anything?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, if you want to get involved.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I have to roll for that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No no no, you just use half your movement for that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take out Craven Edge, and I'd like to swing twice against him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a 25?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 25 hits, that's good. And a 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Misses.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Misses. 18. 21 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 points of damage. All righty.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And roll for the DC.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, he makes it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Son of a bitch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Sorry. All right, so.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I move, or is getting up my movement?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can move, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I want to move around, just stay right next to him, but move around behind him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there, you mean?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax is there, then that would be your flanking potential there. Okay. Cool. That ends your turn. Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did Grog moving activate Vax? Didn't you hold your turn or something?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, he didn't.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: He chucked knives.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Wow. Best fight ever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, and that is Eyebite. All right, so it's a-- you said wisdom save?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a wisdom save.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. What's the DC?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, he fails it. So what are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because we want this fight to continue, that would sort of end it, won't it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do whatever you want, I dunno.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: That's a great look.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do something funny.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I want him to go to sleep in the sand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just curl up in the fetal position.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Okay, what happens is, as soon as you move around, Grog, and you sing at him? He glances over at you for a second and his eyes roll back and he (impact sound) and just falls back in the sand, unconscious.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scanlan Shorthalt.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Ladies and gentlemen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was a quick fight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As he's currently unconscious and affected by Eyebite. All right, do you want to move or are you staying where you are on your turn? Bonus action?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, he can't swipe at me if I walk away, so I'm gonna get away from him. Although he can move super fast. I'll walk a little bit away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now in the middle of the room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I'll inspire Grog, in case this fight continues, and I will sing--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, you know what? No, go ahead. I forgot to read something. Go ahead. My own fault.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's the best.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Take your d10.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (yelling)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is amazing!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you, that was genius.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (yelling)

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: As the worlds collide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends Scanlan's turn. Vax, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grog, Grog, Grog, do we really want to do this? He's down, he's asleep!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do we do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we doing this, are we really doing this? He's asleep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What, like, so if we hit him, does he wake up?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He will, but you get, you'll get a few licks in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're not trying to kill him, we want him to work with us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You fucking end him and you end him now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, kill him.

lines.name: LIAM

As you're striking the blades at him, the pain, he's just taking the pain to his back, now, because he's facing Scanlan, and both times hack into the back of his shoulderblades and the exposed muscle you can see as the blade draws back you can see the muscle and the blood arcing after each draw of the weapon. However, he glances over his shoulder at you as you finish your second blow and at the end of your turn he's gonna use two action points to use Whirlwind of Blows--

As you drop Craven Edge, you hear this voice scream in the back of your head, "You fool! This fight is ours!" As the hammer lights up, you just feel this cold dread run down your spine. I need you to make a will saving throw. A wisdom saving throw.

lines.text: Your vision goes dark as all the sight around you goes to black and the entire vicinity of this fades except for the Earthbreaker before you, just staring at you in this darkness. Then he steps towards you, one step, second step, and while his mouth doesn't move, you can hear his voice piercing into your head that just says, "Grog. You are stronger than this thing that binds "you. Where do you find your strength?"

lines.text: (cheering)

lines.text: At this point, he takes a moment and closes his eyes, and you can see there's this inner glow in his chest, and a bunch of his wounds heal up in but an instant. And as those wounds leave these scars, he looks across the body. "I will wear these with pride."

lines.text: "The other, leathers adorned by the champion of the Raven Queen. This champion's tomb has since "come to ruin, sunken beneath a lake to the west of here known as the Marrowglade Loch. Within that "tomb lies the Deathwalker's Ward. Now go. You've found your strength. You know your path. I can "help you no further." He turns around, walks back to the center of the sand, and just sits back down in the same pose and position he was in when you entered.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: SAM, LIAM

lines.text: Okay.

lines.text: No.

lines.text: As you see his cheeks fill with bile and liquid of your previous venture at the bar, you instinctually, as the mighty speed and reaction of an air-based Ashari druid, dodge out of the way as he spatters the stonework on the outside of this--

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, we should go.

lines.text: Thank you for having us!

lines.text: For a couple episodes, yeah.

lines.text: Yeah guys, well done everyone.

lines.text: Yeah, come see us in Portland, we'll be there tomorrow, getting there tomorrow but we'll be there for Saturday and Sunday, come see us, come, y'know, bring your stories, we'd love to meet you.
